meanings.definition: A person who delivers jokes or humorous lines with a deliberately impassive expression.
meanings.sent1: The deadpanners in the comedy club had the audience in stitches.
meanings.sent2: The group of deadpanners performed at the talent show.
meanings.sent3: The deadpanners at the party kept a straight face even when telling the funniest jokes.
meanings.sent4: Her poker face made her the deadpanners of the office, always delivering jokes with a serious look.
meanings.sent5: The deadpanners' performance was so convincing, everyone thought they were serious.
